uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.common

Interface WorkflowBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActivityPort, Child<T>, Configurable, ControlLink, DepthPort, GranularDepthPort, InputPort, IterationStrategyNode, IterationStrategyParent, IterationStrategyTopNode, Named, OutputPort, Port, Ported, ProcessorPort, ReceiverPort, Revisioned, Root, SenderPort, Typed, WorkflowPort
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCloneable, AbstractDepthPort, AbstractGranularDepthPort, AbstractNamed, AbstractRevisioned, Activity, Annotation, BlockingControlLink, Configuration, CrossProduct, DataLink, DotProduct, InputActivityPort, InputProcessorPort, InputWorkflowPort, IterationStrategyStack, OutputActivityPort, OutputProcessorPort, OutputWorkflowPort, PortNode, Processor, ProcessorBinding, ProcessorInputPortBinding, ProcessorOutputPortBinding, ProcessorPortBinding, Profile, Revision, Workflow, WorkflowBundle

    public interface WorkflowBean
extends Cloneable
    The top level interface for all objects in a workflow.
    Author:
    Alan R Williams, Stian Soiland-Reyes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(Visitor visitor)
      Accepts a Visitor to this WorkflowBean.
      WorkflowBean clone()
      Create a deep clone of this bean.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        boolean accept(Visitor visitor)
        Accepts a Visitor to this WorkflowBean.
        Parameters:
        visitor - the Visitor to accept
        Returns:
        true if this WorkflowBeans children should be visited.

      • clone

        WorkflowBean clone()
        Create a deep clone of this bean.

        The cloned bean will have equivalent properties as the original bean. Any Child beans which parent match this bean will be cloned as well (recursively), non-child beans will remain the same. If this bean is a Child, the returned clone will not have a parent set.

        Note that children whose Child.getParent() is null might not be cloned, to avoid this, use Scufl2Tools.setParents(uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.container.WorkflowBundle) before cloning.

        Returns:
        A cloned workflow bean
